title: He ate food that he was incharge of distributing to poor & needy, what should he do? assim al hakeem
transcript: my question is someone someone was in charge in distributing packets of food for a number of people but he consumed them then what should what should we do now someone who's in charge of Distributing food to the needy he consumed it he's a thief he betrayed the trust given to him and put in him by those people who gave him this food to distribute by consuming it he betrayed this trust and stole the money what to do he has to evaluate how much it was and then give exactly the same back to Those whom he was ordered to distribute the food to in addition to repenting to Allah showing deep and sincere remorse seeking Allah's forgiveness and doing good deeds
